parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: An object that specifies the sources for the media concatenation pipeline. (dict) --- The source type and media pipeline configuration settings in a configuration object. The type of concatenation source in a configuration object. The concatenation settings for the media pipeline in a configuration object. The media pipeline ARN in the configuration object of a media capture pipeline. The meeting configuration settings in a media capture pipeline configuration object. The configuration for the artifacts in an Amazon Chime SDK meeting concatenation. The configuration for the audio artifacts concatenation. Enables or disables the configuration object. The configuration for the video artifacts concatenation. The configuration for the content artifacts concatenation. The configuration for the data channel artifacts concatenation. The configuration for the transcription messages artifacts concatenation. The configuration for the meeting events artifacts concatenation. The configuration for the composited video artifacts concatenation. Enables or disables the configuration object.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of concatenation source in a configuration object.

nested_params.name: MediaCapturePipelineSourceConfiguration
nested_params.description: The concatenation settings for the media pipeline in a configuration object.

nested_params.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_params.description: The media pipeline ARN in the configuration object of a media capture pipeline.

nested_params.name: ChimeSdkMeetingConfiguration
nested_params.description: The meeting configuration settings in a media capture pipeline configuration object.

nested_params.name: ArtifactsConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configuration for the artifacts in an Amazon Chime SDK meeting concatenation.

nested_params.name: Audio

parameters.name: Sinks
parameters.description: An object that specifies the data sinks for the media concatenation pipeline. (dict) --- The data sink of the configuration object. The type of data sink in the configuration object. The configuration settings for an Amazon S3 bucket sink. The destination URL of the S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of data sink in the configuration object.

nested_params.name: S3BucketSinkConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configuration settings for an Amazon S3 bucket sink.

nested_params.name: Destination
nested_params.description: The destination URL of the S3 bucket.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the client request. The token makes the API request idempotent. Use a unique token for each media concatenation pipeline request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags associated with the media concatenation pipeline. (dict) --- A key/value pair that grants users access to meeting resources. The key half of a tag. The value half of a tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key half of a tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value half of a tag.
